scripts.build:cloud: shx rm -rf dist && cd ../.. && npm run build:parser && npm run build:sql && shx mkdir -p ./packages/cloud/dist/parser && shx cp -r ./packages/parser/dist ./packages/cloud/dist/parser/dist && cd packages/cloud && tsc
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:cloud && dotenv -- node ./dist/cloud/test/test_env_for_deploy.js && dotenv -- serverless deploy --config serverless.dev.yml
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:cloud && dotenv -- node ./dist/cloud/test/test_env_for_deploy.js && dotenv -- serverless deploy --config serverless.prod.yml
scripts.start:fix-cross-year-timestamps: npm run build:cloud && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/src/operations/fixCrossYearTimestamps.js
scripts.start:generate-map-image: npm run build:cloud && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/src/operations/generateMapImage.js
scripts.test:refresh-competitive-stats: npm run build:cloud && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/test/test_refresh_competitive_stats.js
scripts.test:refresh-spell-icons: npm run build:cloud && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./dist/cloud/test/test_refresh_spell_icons.js
